titles.title: Protecting Family Caregivers from Discrimination Act of 2020
Protecting Family Caregivers from Discrimination Act of 2020
A bill to protect employees from discrimination based on family caregiver responsibilities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Protecting Family Caregivers from Discrimination Act of 2020
This bill prohibits employers from taking adverse employment actions against employees, or refusing to hire applicants, due to their family caregiver responsibilities. The bill also includes prohibitions against employer retaliation and provides for enforcement by the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission and private civil claims.
